metadata.titleEn: Full-band spectral measurements of typical land cover types in China
metadata.titleCn: 中国区域典型地表全波段光谱数据集（2017)
metadata.description: The full-spectrum spectral measurements were conducted over 8 land cover types, including four vegetation types (i.e., forests (larch), shrubs, grasses and crops (maize)), two soil types (i.e., ordinary soil and frozen soil), snow, and cement road. Three spectrometer types were utilized to assemble the data records, namely the reflectance measurement from visible to shortwave infrared region (solar reflectance spectra), the emissivity measurement in the thermal infrared region (thermal emission spectra), and the microwave radiation measurement in the microwave region (microwave radiation). They were measured synchronously with ASD/SVC reflectance spectrometer, 102F/BOMAN emissivity meter, and microwave radiometers (RPG/JYRS). Associated with the spectra, the parameters describing the targets’ properties such as the object type, observed time, location, the solar and sensor geometry, satellite images as well as the observed instrument and contributions of units, were simultaneously recorded as the auxiliary information to describe the spectral measurement scene. The satellite pixel spectra (i.e., 10 m sentinel-OLI reflectance and 500 m MODIS reflectance) corresponding to the measured site was also extracted. This spectra library aids particularly the development of the modeling ，can also support further research on cross-spectrum domains underlying mechanisms, i.e. the physical radiative transfer processes, and the retrieval of surface biophysical and biochemical parameters. They can serve as a reference truth for satellite observations in validation. The full-spectrum spectra provide more useful information for characterizing the spectral endmembers of remote sensing models, thus support more accurate identification and classification of surface type.
metadata.descriptionCn: 数据集中涵盖了8种土地覆盖类型的全波段光谱，包括四种植被类型（落叶松、灌木、草和玉米作物）、两种土壤类型（普通土壤和冻土）、雪和水泥路。全波段光谱包括同步测量地物的可见光-红外反射率光谱（测量仪器为ASD/SVC），发射率光谱（测量仪器为102F/BOMAN）、微波辐射(RPG/JYRS)。同步测量了描述目标属性的参数文件（如地物类型、观测时间、位置、太阳-传感器观测几何、同步卫星图像、观测仪器、观测单位），以及相对应的卫星像素光谱（包括10m哨兵OLI反射率和500m MODIS反射率）。全波段数据获取于承德、张家口和长春开展的全波段同步测量实验。每个特定目标的光谱被由重复观测的光谱取平均值所得。为了获取平滑连续的光谱曲线，应用最小二乘多项式拟合算法去除大气水汽波段的异常波动，并使用分段线性插值函数将光谱曲线插值到1nm光谱分辨率。该数据集有助于辐射传输建模，特别是跨波段，也可用于生理化参数的反演，或作为真实性检验的相对“真值“。特别地，可以提供像元端元波谱特征识别，支持地物识别和分类。
metadata.instructions: This dataset includes 11 full-spectrum data records. Each full-spectrum spectra data record was organized in a folder named as “AAAA_BBBB_CCCC_YYYYMMDDHHMMSS_XXXX”. The “AAAA” were set as “spec, respectively. The “BBBB_CCCC” means the land cover and the object name. The “YYYYMMDDHHMMSS” shows the measured time. The core files of the full-spectrum include the combination data of reflectance, emissivity, microwave bright temperature, metadata files, and the satellite data. The data file was processed as TXT format and the metadata file was set as XML format. The satellite data and the quick view image were set as Tiff and JPEG format, respectively. As for the name of each spectral data, the file name is recorded as “AAAA_BBBB_CCCC_YYYYMMDDHHMMSS_XXXX”, where the “XXXX” shows the file type, “A000” means the data file, and “B000” means the auxiliary file of XML. The “AAAA” represents the spectral types, where “refl”, “emis”, and “mwra” denote the reflectance, emissivity, and microwave emissivity, respectively. And the “pixel”, “img”, and “view” represent the satellite pixel spectral, the satellite image, and the quick-view image, respectively. Regarding the name of the metadata, “AAAA” was set as “comp” and “pixel” . “comp”refer to the scene information of the spectra，and “pixel” indicates the information of satellite pixel spectra.
metadata.instructionsCn: 全波段光谱文件及相关参数文件都在名为“AAAA_BBBB_CCCC_YYYYMMDDHHMMS_XXXX”的文件夹中。“AAAA”被设置为“spec”，“BBBB_CCCC”是指土地覆盖物和地物名称，“YYYYMMDD HHMMSS”表示测量的时间。全光谱的核心文件包括反射率、发射率、微波明亮温度、元数据文件和卫星数据。其中观测数据被处理为TXT格式，元数据文件被处理为XML格式，卫星数据和快速查看图像分别处理为Tiff和JPEG格式。文件命名为“AAAA_BBBB_CCCC_YYYYMMDDHHMMS_XXXX”，其中“XXXX”表示文件类型，“A000”表示数据文件，“B000”表示XML的辅助文件。“AAAA”表示光谱类型，其中“refl”、“emis”和“mwra”分别表示反射率、发射率和微波发射率。“pixel”、“img”和“view”分别表示卫星像素光谱、卫星图像和快速视图图像。对于元数据文件，“AAAA”分别设置为“comp”和“pixel”。“comp”表示光谱的场景信息，“pixel”表示卫星像素光谱的信息。

background: Field-measured spectra are critical for remote sensing physical modelling, retrieval of structural, biophysical, and biochemical parameters, and other practical applications. To the best of our knowledge, this library is unique in simultaneously providing full-band, multi-angle, multi-scale spectral measurements of the main surface elements of China covering a large spatial extent over a 10-year period.
research objective: In this paper, we present the full-wave band, multi-angle, multi-scale, and temporal dynamic spectral library dubbed Ground Object Spectral Library (GOSPEL).
challenges: However, there are several limitations to the exiting libraries. First, they provide spectra in shortwave, infrared, or microwave domains separately. This discontinuity does not meet the requirements for developing a unified spectral-domain radiative transfer model and its associated applications. Second, they rarely measure (and release) anisotropic spectra across different spectral domains. Nevertheless, apparent anisotropy exists in the surface reflectivity in the VNIR-SWIR spectral domain (e.g., bidirectional reflectance distribution function (BRDF)), emissivity in the TIR spectral domain (e.g., directional bright temperature), and reflectivity or emissivity in the microwave spectral domains (e.g., directional microwave radiation). Ignoring the directionality of satellite observations may lead to large errors in the retrieval of remote sensing radiation and vegetation structure variables. Therefore, the multi-angular spectra are a pressing need to advance the estimation of surface energy budget and modeling of land surface processes. Third, there is a lack of multiscale spectra measurements (e.g., leaf and canopy spectra), which hinders the understanding of cross-scale physical radiative transfer and associated ecological processes. Hence, the collection of multiscale spectra is much needed to help improve the understanding of cross-scale radiative transfer processes from individual leaves to canopies and even ecosystems and promote the exploration of scaling effects on ecological processes (e.g., upscaling plant function traits). Furthermore, the temporal dynamic spectra for typical vegetation are insufficient. Given the fact that the vegetation dynamics are crucial for modeling land cover change and plant phenology as well as its feedback to climate change, vegetation spectra across different growth stages need to be further supplemented in order to improve the monitoring and modeling of land cover and land use change, and surface phenology in general.
methods: We present a library of field spectra, which includes (1) portable field spectroradiometer measurements of vegetation, soil, and snow in the full-wave band, (2) multi-angle spectra measurements of desert vegetation, chernozems, and snow with consideration of the anisotropic reflectance of land surface, (3) multi-scale spectra measurements of leaf and canopy of different vegetation cover surfaces, and (4) continuous reflectance spectra time-series data revealing vegetation growth dynamics of maize, rice, wheat, rape, grassland, and so on. Furthermore, the 101 by 101 satellite pixels of Landsat ETM/OLI and MODIS surface reflectance centered around the field site were extracted, providing a vital linkage between ground measurements and satellite observations.
dataset: We present a library of field spectra, which includes (1) portable field spectroradiometer measurements of vegetation, soil, and snow in the full-wave band, (2) multi-angle spectra measurements of desert vegetation, chernozems, and snow with consideration of the anisotropic reflectance of land surface, (3) multi-scale spectra measurements of leaf and canopy of different vegetation cover surfaces, and (4) continuous reflectance spectra time-series data revealing vegetation growth dynamics of maize, rice, wheat, rape, grassland, and so on.
findings: We believe that this spectral library will undoubtedly advance the development of the modeling of plant growth and vegetation phenology, support further research on cross-scale ecological processes and underlying mechanisms, the quantification of the geometric effects of solar and sensor on the physical radiative transfer processes, and the retrieval of surface biophysical and biochemical parameters. Moreover, it can serve as the ground-truth information for validation of satellite spectral measurements.
backgroundCn: 现场测量的光谱对于遥感物理建模、结构、生物物理和生化参数的提取以及其他实际应用至关重要。据我们所知，该库在同时提供中国主要地表元素的全波段、多角度、多尺度光谱测量方面是独一无二的，覆盖了大范围的空间，并持续了10年。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，我们呈现了一个全波段、多角度、多尺度和时间动态光谱库，称为地面物体光谱库（GOSPEL）。
challengesCn: 然而，现有库存在几个局限性。首先，它们分别提供短波、红外或微波域的光谱。这种不连续性不符合开发统一光谱域辐射传输模型及其相关应用的要求。其次，它们很少测量（并发布）不同光谱域的各向异性光谱。然而，在VNIR-SWIR光谱域（例如，双向反射分布函数（BRDF））的表面反射率、TIR光谱域（例如，方向亮温）的发射率以及微波光谱域（例如，方向微波辐射）中，明显存在各向异性。如果忽视卫星观测的方向性，可能会导致遥感辐射和植被结构变量的提取出现较大误差。因此，多角度光谱的需求迫在眉睫，以推动表面能量预算的估算和陆地表面过程的建模。第三，缺乏多尺度光谱测量（例如，叶片和冠层光谱），这阻碍了对跨尺度物理辐射传输及相关生态过程的理解。因此，收集多尺度光谱是非常必要的，以帮助改善从单个叶片到冠层甚至生态系统的跨尺度辐射传输过程的理解，并促进对生态过程（例如，植物功能性状的上尺度化效应）的探索。此外，典型植被的时间动态光谱不足。考虑到植被动态对于建模土地覆盖变化和植物物候以及其对气候变化的反馈至关重要，不同生长阶段的植被光谱需要进一步补充，以改善土地覆盖和土地利用变化的监测与建模，以及一般的表面物候。
methodsCn: 我们提供一个光谱库，包括（1）便携式现场光谱辐射计对植被、土壤和雪的全波段测量，（2）考虑地表各向异性反射的沙漠植被、黑土和雪的多角度光谱测量，（3）不同植被覆盖表面的叶片和冠层的多尺度光谱测量，以及（4）揭示玉米、水稻、小麦、油菜、草地等植物生长动态的连续反射光谱时间序列数据。此外，还提取了围绕现场的101 x 101个Landsat ETM/OLI和MODIS表面反射率卫星像素，为地面测量与卫星观测之间提供了重要的联系。
datasetCn: 我们提供一个光谱库，包括以下内容：(1) 便携式现场光谱辐射计对植被、土壤和雪的全波段测量，(2) 考虑地表各向异性反射的沙漠植被、黑土和雪的多角度光谱测量，(3) 不同植被覆盖表面的叶片和冠层的多尺度光谱测量，以及 (4) 连续反射光谱时间序列数据，揭示玉米、水稻、小麦、油菜、草地等植物的生长动态。
findingsCn: 我们相信，这个光谱库无疑将推动植物生长和植被物候模型的发展，支持对跨尺度生态过程及其基本机制的进一步研究，量化太阳和传感器对物理辐射传输过程的几何效应，以及提取地表生物物理和生化参数。此外，它还可以作为卫星光谱测量验证的地面真实信息。

Verification.QuestionCn: 该领域是否涉及多角度光谱测量以考虑各向异性反射？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is there a need for multiscale spectra measurements to better understand cross-scale radiative transfer processes?
Verification.QuestionCn: 是否需要进行多尺度光谱测量，以更好地理解跨尺度辐射传输过程？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the key methods used in collecting full-band spectral data for various land cover types in China?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在中国收集各种土地覆盖类型的全波段光谱数据的关键方法有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: portable field spectroradiometer measurements, multi-angle spectra measurements, multi-scale spectra measurements, continuous reflectance spectra time-series data
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 便携式现场光谱辐射计测量，多角度光谱测量，多尺度光谱测量，连续反射光谱时间序列数据

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with the collection of multiscale spectral data in ecological research?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在生态研究中，收集多尺度光谱数据面临哪些挑战？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that captures the multi-angle spectral measurements of land surfaces in diverse spectral domains?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的示例，该方法捕获不同光谱域中土地表面的多角度光谱测量？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method for capturing multi-angle spectral measurements involves using portable field spectroradiometers to measure the anisotropic reflectance of desert vegetation, chernozems, and snow across full-wave bands, while considering the directional properties of the land surface.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法是使用便携式现场光谱辐射计测量沙漠植被、黑土和雪的各向异性反射率，涵盖全波段，同时考虑地表的方向特性。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a dataset that integrates both ground-based spectral measurements and satellite observations for a comprehensive analysis?
Example.QuestionCn: 一个整合了地面光谱测量和卫星观测的综合分析数据集的例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is one that includes portable field spectroradiometer measurements of vegetation, soil, and snow, along with the extraction of satellite pixels from Landsat ETM/OLI and MODIS surface reflectance, providing a linkage between ground measurements and satellite data.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子是包含植被、土壤和雪的便携式场地光谱辐射计测量，以及从Landsat ETM/OLI和MODIS表面反射率中提取的卫星像素，提供了地面测量与卫星数据之间的联系。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of how temporal dynamic spectra are used to monitor vegetation growth stages?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个示例，说明如何使用时间动态光谱监测植被生长阶段？
Example.AnswerEn: Temporal dynamic spectra are used to monitor vegetation growth stages by providing continuous reflectance spectra time-series data that reveal the growth dynamics of various vegetation types such as maize, rice, wheat, rape, and grassland.
Example.AnswerCn: 时间动态光谱用于监测植物生长阶段，通过提供连续的反射光谱时间序列数据，揭示了玉米、水稻、小麦、油菜和草地等各种植物类型的生长动态。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the critical features of a dataset that includes multi-angle and multi-scale spectral measurements for remote sensing applications?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 包含多角度和多尺度光谱测量的遥感应用数据集的关键特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: full-wave band spectral data, anisotropic reflectance of land surfaces, spectra measurements at different scales, continuous reflectance spectra time-series data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全波段光谱数据、地表各向异性反射率、不同尺度的光谱测量、连续反射光谱时间序列数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are some challenges in collecting and utilizing spectral data across different spectral domains for remote sensing?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在不同光谱域中收集和利用遥感光谱数据面临哪些挑战？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: discontinuity of spectra, anisotropic spectral measurements, difficulty of obtaining multiscale spectra, capturing temporal dynamic spectra
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 光谱的不连续性，各向异性光谱测量，获取多尺度光谱的难度，捕捉时间动态光谱。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics are essential for a dataset that aims to support the modeling of plant growth and vegetation phenology?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 支持植物生长和植被物候建模的数据集所需的基本特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: full-wave band spectral measurements, multi-angle and multi-scale spectra, continuous time-series data of vegetation reflectance
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全波段光谱测量、多角度和多尺度光谱、植被反射率的连续时间序列数据

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many types of land cover are included in a dataset focusing on full-band spectra?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 一个专注于全波段光谱的数据集中包含多少种土地覆盖类型？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the number of satellite pixels used to link ground measurements to satellite observations in a spectral library?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在光谱库中，用于将地面测量与卫星观测链接的卫星像素数量是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'full-wave band spectra' in the context of field spectra measurements?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在现场光谱测量的背景下，“全波段光谱”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Full-wave band spectra refer to the comprehensive measurement of reflectance and emissivity across various spectral domains, including the visible, near-infrared, shortwave infrared, thermal infrared, and microwave spectral domains, as captured by portable field spectroradiometers and related instruments.
Definition.AnswerCn: 全波段光谱是指通过便携式现场光谱辐射计和相关仪器对可见光、近红外、短波红外、热红外和微波光谱域进行的反射率和发射率的综合测量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What constitutes 'multi-scale spectra measurements' when assessing vegetation cover surfaces?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在评估植被覆盖表面时，什么构成“多尺度光谱测量”？
Definition.AnswerEn: Multi-scale spectra measurements refer to collecting spectral data at varying spatial scales, such as individual leaves and entire plant canopies, to understand cross-scale radiative transfer processes and the scaling effects on ecological processes, including plant functional traits and surface energy budgets.
Definition.AnswerCn: 多尺度光谱测量是指在不同空间尺度上收集光谱数据，例如单个叶片和整个植物冠层，以理解跨尺度的辐射传输过程以及对生态过程的尺度效应，包括植物功能性状和表面能量预算。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do continuous reflectance spectra time-series data compare to static spectral measurements in terms of their utility for monitoring vegetation growth dynamics and modeling land cover change?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 连续反射光谱时间序列数据与静态光谱测量在监测植被生长动态和建模土地覆盖变化方面的效用如何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Continuous reflectance spectra time-series data offer dynamic insights into vegetation growth stages and phenological changes, providing a temporal dimension that static spectral measurements lack. This dynamic aspect is crucial for accurate modeling of land cover change and understanding plant phenology, allowing for the observation of growth patterns and responses to environmental changes over time. Static measurements, while useful for snapshot analyses, do not capture temporal variability essential for these applications.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 连续反射光谱时间序列数据提供了对植被生长阶段和物候变化的动态洞察，提供了静态光谱测量所缺乏的时间维度。这种动态特性对于准确建模土地覆盖变化和理解植物物候至关重要，能够观察生长模式和对环境变化的响应。静态测量虽然对快照分析有用，但无法捕捉对这些应用至关重要的时间变异性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches are employed to ensure the accuracy and consistency of full-wave band spectral measurements across different land cover types?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 为了确保不同土地覆盖类型的全波段光谱测量的准确性和一致性，采用了哪些方法论方法？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The methodology involves the use of portable field spectroradiometer measurements, multi-angle spectral measurements considering anisotropic reflectance, and multi-scale spectra measurements of leaf and canopy. Additionally, continuous reflectance spectra time-series data and linkage with satellite data are utilized to ensure accuracy and consistency.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 该方法涉及使用便携式现场光谱辐射计测量、多角度光谱测量（考虑各向异性反射）以及叶片和冠层的多尺度光谱测量。此外，还利用连续反射光谱时间序列数据和与卫星数据的关联，以确保准确性和一致性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the need for multi-angle spectral measurements in data collection methods within this field?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在该领域的数据收集方法中，导致需要多角度光谱测量的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: There is a need for multi-angle spectral measurements due to the anisotropic reflectance of land surfaces, which affects the retrieval of remote sensing radiation and vegetation structure variables. Ignoring the directionality of satellite observations can lead to large errors in these retrievals.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于地表的各向异性反射特性，存在对多角度光谱测量的需求，这会影响遥感辐射和植被结构变量的提取。忽视卫星观测的方向性可能导致这些提取结果出现较大误差。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a demand for multiscale spectral measurements when collecting data in this domain?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在这个领域收集数据时对多尺度光谱测量有需求？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The demand for multiscale spectral measurements arises from the need to understand cross-scale physical radiative transfer and associated ecological processes. The lack of such data hinders the exploration of scaling effects on ecological processes and the improvement of upscaling plant function traits from individual leaves to canopies and ecosystems.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 多尺度光谱测量的需求源于理解跨尺度物理辐射传输及相关生态过程的需要。缺乏此类数据阻碍了对生态过程的尺度效应的探索，以及从单个叶片到树冠和生态系统的植物功能性状的上尺度化改进。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the necessity of continuous reflectance spectra time-series data for vegetation in this field?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在该领域中，哪些因素促成了对植被连续反射光谱时间序列数据的必要性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The necessity for continuous reflectance spectra time-series data is driven by the importance of vegetation dynamics for modeling land cover change, plant phenology, and their feedback to climate change. Supplementing vegetation spectra across different growth stages enhances the monitoring and modeling of land cover, land use change, and surface phenology.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 连续的反射光谱时间序列数据的必要性源于植被动态在建模土地覆盖变化、植物物候以及它们对气候变化反馈中的重要性。在不同生长阶段补充植被光谱，有助于增强对土地覆盖、土地利用变化和地表物候的监测和建模。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the inclusion of continuous reflectance spectra time-series data impact the monitoring and modeling of vegetation growth dynamics and phenology?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 连续反射光谱时间序列数据的纳入可能会如何影响植被生长动态和物候的监测与建模？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The inclusion of continuous reflectance spectra time-series data can significantly improve the monitoring and modeling of vegetation growth dynamics and phenology by providing detailed insights into vegetation changes across different growth stages, which is crucial for understanding land cover changes and plant responses to climate change.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 连续反射光谱时间序列数据的纳入可以显著改善对植被生长动态和物候的监测与建模，因为它提供了关于不同生长阶段植被变化的详细见解，这对于理解土地覆盖变化和植物对气候变化的响应至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What consequences could arise from utilizing multi-scale spectra measurements for understanding cross-scale ecological processes?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用多尺度光谱测量来理解跨尺度生态过程可能会产生哪些后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing multi-scale spectra measurements can advance the understanding of cross-scale ecological processes by facilitating the exploration of scaling effects on ecological processes, such as upscaling plant function traits, and improving the comprehension of radiative transfer processes from individual leaves to canopies and ecosystems.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用多尺度光谱测量可以促进对跨尺度生态过程的理解，帮助探索生态过程中的尺度效应，例如植物功能性状的上尺度化，并改善从单个叶片到树冠和生态系统的辐射传输过程的理解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of creating a dataset that includes full-wave band, multi-angle, and multi-scale spectral measurements across different land cover types in China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 创建一个包含全波段、多角度和多尺度光谱测量的数据库，涵盖中国不同土地覆盖类型的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The aim is to provide a comprehensive spectral library that supports remote sensing physical modeling, retrieval of structural, biophysical, and biochemical parameters, and other practical applications. This dataset addresses the need for continuity in spectral data across different domains and offers a resource for advanced estimation of surface energy budgets and modeling of land surface processes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 该数据集旨在提供一个全面的光谱库，以支持遥感物理建模、结构、生物物理和生化参数的提取以及其他实际应用。该数据集解决了不同领域光谱数据连续性的需求，并为表面能量预算的高级估计和陆地表面过程建模提供了资源。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it essential to include multi-angle and multi-scale spectra measurements in the context of studying land surface processes and ecological dynamics?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么在研究陆地表面过程和生态动态时包含多角度和多尺度光谱测量是至关重要的？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Including multi-angle and multi-scale spectra measurements is crucial because it addresses the anisotropic nature of surface reflectivity and the need to understand cross-scale radiative transfer processes. This approach helps improve the understanding of scaling effects on ecological processes and the modeling of land cover change, vegetation phenology, and surface energy budgets.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 包括多角度和多尺度光谱测量是至关重要的，因为它解决了表面反射率的各向异性特征以及理解跨尺度辐射传输过程的需求。这种方法有助于提高对生态过程尺度效应的理解，以及对土地覆盖变化、植被物候和表面能量预算的建模。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What motivates the integration of temporal dynamic spectra into datasets for monitoring vegetation growth and land cover changes?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 是什么促使将时间动态光谱整合到数据集中以监测植被生长和土地覆盖变化？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The integration of temporal dynamic spectra is motivated by the necessity to capture vegetation dynamics across different growth stages. This information is vital for improving the monitoring and modeling of land cover and land use changes, as well as understanding vegetation phenology and its feedback to climate change.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 时间动态光谱的集成是为了捕捉不同生长阶段的植被动态。这些信息对于改善土地覆盖和土地利用变化的监测与建模，以及理解植被物候及其对气候变化的反馈至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What techniques are employed to ensure the accuracy and consistency of full-band spectral measurements across different land cover types?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保不同土地覆盖类型的全波段光谱测量的准确性和一致性，采用了哪些技术？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The full-band spectral measurements are ensured through the use of portable field spectroradiometer measurements, multi-angle spectra measurements with consideration of anisotropic reflectance, and multi-scale spectra measurements of leaf and canopy. Additionally, continuous reflectance spectra time-series data are used to track vegetation growth dynamics, ensuring accuracy and consistency across different land cover types.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 全波段光谱测量通过使用便携式现场光谱辐射计测量、多角度光谱测量（考虑各向异性反射）以及叶片和冠层的多尺度光谱测量来确保。此外，连续的反射光谱时间序列数据用于跟踪植被生长动态，确保在不同土地覆盖类型之间的准确性和一致性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the process of linking ground spectral measurements to satellite observations executed in this domain?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在这个领域，将地面光谱测量与卫星观测链接的过程是如何执行的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The linkage between ground spectral measurements and satellite observations is established by extracting 101 by 101 satellite pixels of Landsat ETM/OLI and MODIS surface reflectance centered around the field site. This provides a crucial connection between detailed field measurements and broader satellite data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 通过提取以现场位置为中心的101 x 101个Landsat ETM/OLI和MODIS表面反射率的卫星像素，建立了地面光谱测量与卫星观测之间的联系。这为详细的现场测量与更广泛的卫星数据之间提供了重要的连接。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are necessary to preprocess the spectral data for the removal of atmospheric water vapor anomalies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 预处理光谱数据以去除大气水汽异常需要哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To preprocess the spectral data, a least squares polynomial fitting algorithm is applied to remove atmospheric water vapor anomalies. This is followed by the use of a piecewise linear interpolation function to interpolate the spectral curve to a 1nm spectral resolution, resulting in a smooth and continuous spectral curve.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了预处理光谱数据，应用最小二乘多项式拟合算法去除大气水蒸气异常。随后使用分段线性插值函数将光谱曲线插值到1nm的光谱分辨率，从而得到平滑连续的光谱曲线。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods enable the integration of multi-angle and multiscale spectral measurements to improve the modeling of land surface radiative processes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法可以实现多角度和多尺度光谱测量的集成，以改善地表辐射过程的建模？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of multi-angle and multiscale spectral measurements is enabled by the use of portable field spectroradiometers, which measure the anisotropic reflectance of land surfaces, and the collection of spectra from different vegetation surfaces at both leaf and canopy scales. This approach helps improve the understanding of cross-scale radiative transfer processes and supports the modeling of land surface processes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 多角度和多尺度光谱测量的集成得益于便携式现场光谱辐射计的使用，这些仪器测量地表的各向异性反射率，并从叶片和冠层尺度收集不同植被表面的光谱。这种方法有助于提高对跨尺度辐射传输过程的理解，并支持土地表面过程的建模。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do technological advancements in spectroradiometer instruments facilitate the acquisition of full-band spectral data across various land cover types?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 技术进步在光谱辐射计仪器中如何促进在各种土地覆盖类型上获取全波段光谱数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Technological advancements in spectroradiometer instruments, such as those capable of measuring visible, infrared, and microwave spectra, facilitate the acquisition of full-band spectral data across various land cover types. These instruments allow for comprehensive field spectra collection of vegetation, soil, and snow, providing critical data for remote sensing physical modeling and parameter retrieval.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 光谱辐射计仪器的技术进步，例如能够测量可见光、红外和微波光谱的仪器，促进了对各种土地覆盖类型的全波段光谱数据的获取。这些仪器允许对植被、土壤和雪的全面现场光谱收集，为遥感物理建模和参数提取提供了重要数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways does the collection of continuous reflectance spectra time-series data support the monitoring and modeling of vegetation growth dynamics?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 连续反射光谱时间序列数据的收集在监测和建模植被生长动态方面提供了哪些支持？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection of continuous reflectance spectra time-series data supports the monitoring and modeling of vegetation growth dynamics by revealing temporal changes in vegetation, such as maize, rice, wheat, and grassland. This data is crucial for understanding land cover change, plant phenology, and their feedback to climate change, thereby enhancing monitoring and modeling efforts.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 连续反射光谱时间序列数据的收集支持对植被生长动态的监测和建模，通过揭示植被（如玉米、水稻、小麦和草地）的时间变化。这些数据对于理解土地覆盖变化、植物物候及其对气候变化的反馈至关重要，从而增强监测和建模工作。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is there an expectation for continuous reflectance spectra time-series data to significantly aid in the understanding of vegetation growth dynamics?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么对连续反射光谱时间序列数据有期望，认为它能显著帮助理解植被生长动态？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Continuous reflectance spectra time-series data reveal the dynamics of vegetation growth across different stages, which are crucial for improving monitoring and modeling of land cover changes, plant phenology, and their feedback to climate change.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 连续的反射光谱时间序列数据揭示了不同阶段植被生长的动态，这对于改善土地覆盖变化、植物物候及其对气候变化反馈的监测和建模至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might existing spectral libraries be insufficient for advancing the modeling of plant growth and ecological processes?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 现有的光谱库可能不足以推动植物生长和生态过程建模的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Existing spectral libraries often lack comprehensive coverage across spectral domains, do not account for anisotropic spectral measurements, and fail to provide multi-scale data, which are all necessary for a unified spectral-domain radiative transfer model and understanding of ecological processes at various scales.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 现有的光谱库往往在光谱域的覆盖范围上不够全面，未考虑各向异性光谱测量，并且未提供多尺度数据，这些都是统一光谱域辐射传输模型和理解不同尺度生态过程所必需的。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of multi-angle and multi-scale spectral measurements in capturing anisotropy and cross-scale radiative transfer processes in remote sensing?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估多角度和多尺度光谱测量在捕捉遥感中的各向异性和跨尺度辐射传输过程中的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The multi-angle and multi-scale spectral measurements are effective in capturing anisotropy and cross-scale radiative transfer processes as they address the limitations of existing libraries. By providing anisotropic spectra across spectral domains and multiscale spectra measurements, they help improve the understanding of cross-scale radiative transfer processes from individual leaves to canopies and ecosystems, thus advancing the estimation of surface energy budget and modeling land surface processes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多角度和多尺度光谱测量在捕捉各向异性和跨尺度辐射传输过程中有效，因为它们解决了现有库的局限性。通过提供跨光谱域的各向异性光谱和多尺度光谱测量，它们有助于改善对从单个叶片到树冠和生态系统的跨尺度辐射传输过程的理解，从而推动表面能量预算的估算和陆地表面过程的建模。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the primary challenges faced when collecting continuous reflectance spectra time-series data for vegetation growth dynamics?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在收集植被生长动态的连续反射光谱时间序列数据时，面临的主要挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: One primary challenge in collecting continuous reflectance spectra time-series data for vegetation growth dynamics is the insufficiency of temporal dynamic spectra for typical vegetation. This insufficiency can impact modeling land cover change and plant phenology, as well as understanding the feedback to climate change. Ensuring comprehensive temporal coverage across different growth stages is crucial for improving monitoring and modeling efforts.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 收集植被生长动态的连续反射光谱时间序列数据的一个主要挑战是典型植被的时间动态光谱不足。这种不足可能会影响土地覆盖变化和植物物候的建模，以及对气候变化的反馈理解。确保在不同生长阶段具有全面的时间覆盖对于改善监测和建模工作至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your assessment of the potential benefits of linking satellite pixels with ground measurements in spectral studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在光谱研究中将卫星像素与地面测量链接的潜在好处的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Linking satellite pixels with ground measurements can significantly enhance spectral studies by providing a vital linkage between ground measurements and satellite observations. This connection is crucial for validating satellite spectral measurements and supports the modeling of plant growth, vegetation phenology, and the retrieval of surface biophysical and biochemical parameters. Such integration offers a more comprehensive understanding of ecological processes and scaling effects.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 将卫星像素与地面测量链接起来，可以显著增强光谱研究，因为它提供了地面测量与卫星观测之间的重要联系。这种联系对于验证卫星光谱测量至关重要，并支持植物生长、植被物候以及地表生物物理和生化参数的提取。这种整合提供了对生态过程和尺度效应的更全面理解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how field-measured spectra contribute to remote sensing applications or modeling land surface processes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白现场测量的光谱如何对遥感应用或土地表面过程建模产生贡献。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Field-measured spectra are critical for remote sensing physical modeling, retrieval of structural, biophysical, and biochemical parameters. They provide essential data for developing unified spectral-domain radiative transfer models and enable the estimation of surface energy budgets and modeling of land surface processes by incorporating multi-angle, multi-scale, and temporal dynamic spectral data.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 现场测量的光谱对于遥感物理建模、结构、生物物理和生化参数的提取至关重要。它们为开发统一的光谱域辐射传输模型提供了必要的数据，并通过结合多角度、多尺度和时间动态光谱数据，能够估算表面能量预算和建模陆地表面过程。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of the methods used to ensure that field spectra measurements align with satellite data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解确保现场光谱测量与卫星数据对齐所使用的方法。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Methods involve extracting satellite pixels of Landsat ETM/OLI and MODIS surface reflectance centered around field sites, providing vital linkage between ground measurements and satellite observations. This helps in validating satellite spectral measurements and understanding the geometric effects of solar and sensor interactions on radiative transfer processes.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 方法涉及提取围绕实地测量点的Landsat ETM/OLI和MODIS表面反射率的卫星像素，这为地面测量与卫星观测之间提供了重要的联系。这有助于验证卫星光谱测量，并理解太阳和传感器相互作用对辐射传输过程的几何效应。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the techniques used in collecting full-band spectral data of different land cover types in China and how these techniques address the challenges of discontinuity across spectral domains.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结了在中国收集不同土地覆盖类型的全波段光谱数据所使用的技术，以及这些技术如何应对光谱域间不连续性带来的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The techniques involve using portable field spectroradiometers to measure full-wave band spectra of vegetation, soil, and snow. Multi-angle and multi-scale spectral measurements are performed, considering anisotropic reflectance. Additionally, continuous reflectance spectra time-series data are collected to capture vegetation growth dynamics, and satellite pixel data are integrated to link ground and satellite measurements. These approaches help address the discontinuity across spectral domains by providing comprehensive, unified spectra and considering anisotropic and multi-scale characteristics.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 这些技术涉及使用便携式现场光谱辐射计测量植被、土壤和雪的全波段光谱。进行多角度和多尺度的光谱测量，考虑各向异性反射。此外，收集连续的反射光谱时间序列数据，以捕捉植被生长动态，并整合卫星像素数据，以连接地面和卫星测量。这些方法通过提供全面的统一光谱并考虑各向异性和多尺度特征，帮助解决光谱域之间的连续性问题。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the potential advantages of integrating continuous reflectance spectra time-series data with satellite observations for the monitoring and modeling of land cover change.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 探讨将连续反射光谱时间序列数据与卫星观测相结合，以监测和建模土地覆盖变化的潜在优势。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Integrating continuous reflectance spectra time-series data with satellite observations provides a vital linkage between detailed ground measurements and broader satellite data. This integration allows for improved monitoring and modeling of land cover change, as it captures vegetation dynamics across growth stages, which are essential for understanding land cover changes, plant phenology, and feedback to climate change.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 将连续反射光谱时间序列数据与卫星观测相结合，为详细的地面测量与更广泛的卫星数据之间提供了重要的联系。这种整合可以改善对土地覆盖变化的监测和建模，因为它捕捉了不同生长阶段的植被动态，这对于理解土地覆盖变化、植物物候以及对气候变化的反馈至关重要。
